headline: UPS Stock Falls on Earnings Miss, Weak Growth. Dividend Is ‘Rock Solid,’ Says CEO.
summary: United Parcel Service stock dropped Tuesday after the company reported weaker-than-expected earnings.  UPS  on Tuesday announced second-quarter earnings per share of $1.55 on sales of $21.2 billion.  Wall Street had expected a profit of $1.56 a share on sales of $20.9 billion, according to Bloomberg.

headline: How major US stock indexes fared Tuesday, 7/29/2025
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 204 points, and the Nasdaq composite sliced 0.4% off its own record. SoFi Technologies rallied, but Merck and UPS fell following a jumbled set of profit reports. Treasury yields sank in the bond market as the Federal Reserve began a two-day meeting on interest rates.

headline: UnitedHealth, UPS, and Whirlpool Show First Cracks in a Strong Earnings Season
summary: United Parcel Service  the world’s biggest package-delivery group, said that given uncertainty about the economic outlook, it is no longer providing guidance on revenue or operating profit.  Tariffs were cited as part of the “dynamic and evolving trade environment” the group is trying to negotiate into the back half of the year.  A soft housing market and efforts by Asia-based rivals to build up stockpiles of appliances ahead of tariffs taking effect dragged on the results and remain a risk for the year.

raw.headline: UnitedHealth, UPS, and Whirlpool Show First Cracks in a Strong Earnings Season
raw.summary: United Parcel Service  the world’s biggest package-delivery group, said that given uncertainty about the economic outlook, it is no longer providing guidance on revenue or operating profit.  Tariffs were cited as part of the “dynamic and evolving trade environment” the group is trying to negotiate into the back half of the year.  A soft housing market and efforts by Asia-based rivals to build up stockpiles of appliances ahead of tariffs taking effect dragged on the results and remain a risk for the year.

headline: Baker Hughes deal, UPS guidance, SoFi Q2 beat: Trending Tickers
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) is acquiring cryogenic equipment maker Chart Industries (GTLS) in a $13.6 billion deal, signaling further consolidation in the oilfield services space. UPS (UPS) stock slumps after the company reported mixed quarterly results and declined to offer full-year guidance, citing macroeconomic uncertainty. SoFi (SOFI) stock is soaring after the company reported a strong earnings beat, with revenue surging 44% year over year and the company adding a record 850,000 new members in the quarter. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: UPS profit misses estimates on shifting US trade policy
summary: (Reuters) -United Parcel Service posted quarterly profit marginally below estimates on Tuesday and did not provide a full-year revenue forecast again, deepening concerns around the impact of changing U.S. trade policies on the delivery giant.  "A combination of lower-than-expected overall and U.S. Domestic margins as well as fully rescinded guidance is likely to be viewed unfavorably," Evercore ISI analyst Jonathan Chappell said.  The company did not provide an annual revenue or operating profit outlook for a second straight quarter, citing ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty.

raw.headline: UPS profit misses estimates on shifting US trade policy
raw.summary: (Reuters) -United Parcel Service posted quarterly profit marginally below estimates on Tuesday and did not provide a full-year revenue forecast again, deepening concerns around the impact of changing U.S. trade policies on the delivery giant.  "A combination of lower-than-expected overall and U.S. Domestic margins as well as fully rescinded guidance is likely to be viewed unfavorably," Evercore ISI analyst Jonathan Chappell said.  The company did not provide an annual revenue or operating profit outlook for a second straight quarter, citing ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty.

headline: UPS Releases 2Q 2025 Earnings
summary: ATLANTA, July 29, 2025--UPS (NYSE:UPS) today announced second-quarter 2025 consolidated revenues of $21.2 billion. Consolidated operating profit was $1.8 billion; $1.9 billion on a non-GAAP adjusted basis. Diluted earnings per share were $1.51 for the quarter; non-GAAP adjusted diluted earnings per share were $1.55.

raw.headline: UPS Releases 2Q 2025 Earnings
raw.summary: ATLANTA, July 29, 2025--UPS (NYSE:UPS) today announced second-quarter 2025 consolidated revenues of $21.2 billion. Consolidated operating profit was $1.8 billion; $1.9 billion on a non-GAAP adjusted basis. Diluted earnings per share were $1.51 for the quarter; non-GAAP adjusted diluted earnings per share were $1.55.

headline: S&P, Nasdaq futures edge up amid earnings, UnitedHealth pressures Dow
summary: S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures ticked higher on Tuesday as investors assessed earnings reports from some of the top U.S. companies, while Dow futures lost some steam following a gloomy outlook from heavyweight UnitedHealth.  At 06:50 a.m. ET, S&P 500 E-minis were up 17.75 points, or 0.28%, and Nasdaq 100 E-minis were up 110.75 points, or 0.47%.  Dow E-minis rose 0.04%, but the gains were capped as healthcare conglomerate UnitedHealth dropped 4.7% in premarket trading following a disappointing profit forecast.
